TopicTitle: Help with a short film I am making.

Articles.Content:
Hi fellow kerbals, I am in a bit of a pinch and need some help.

Well, I am working on a short film based in a time where a strange cataclysmic event, which remains unknown the the survivors, has come upon earth and humanity itself. Made mostly by me, except a few assets from a buddy. Anyways, I am having trouble with a few things.

1. Name: I a really can't find any sort of name that hasn't been taken yet, and I want it to be unique.

2. Advice: I intend for it to be a found footage style film, which I have no experience in whatsoever. Any advice from fellow moviemakers, would be nice.

3. Music: I really need to find some music which fits a lonely, dark, cold, and desolate atmosphere.

And I need to get all this done by the end of next week, as that is the window of time I have to finish it.

Thanks!

~CosmicK3rbal
